text: This evening Donald J. Trump spoke at AIPAC in Washington, D.C. Mr. Trump took a strong position on Israel in a speech prepared with input from key foreign policy and foreign relations advisers. The transcript of the remarks can be viewed in the link below.Donald J. Trump Remarks at AIPAC: http://www.donaldjtrump.com/media/donald-j-trump-remarks-at-aipac
title: Press Release - Donald J. Trump Delivers Remarks at AIPAC
